section.p: The pregnancy history section contains coded entries describing the patient history of pregnancies.

ol.li: SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="10162-6" HISTORY OF PREGNANCIES (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="10162-6" HISTORY OF PREGNANCIES (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Observation (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5)
